Journal Story: Hi. I am Tony. Or Ynot on trail. Just like to give a little background and introduce myself to the community. 40yrs young. Father of a 21 yr old son and 5 year old boy/girl twins. Grandfather of 2. Married x3...Divorced x3. I am learning. In a wonderful relationship with a woman that wholeheartedly supports me and my dreams. I am also a 14 year Honorably Discharged Army vet. I initially learned of the AT and thru-hiking only a few months ago and have been addicted to the idea since. I told myself it was something I wanted to accomplish within the next 5 years or by my 45th birthday. The more I researched and the more I read blogs of past, present and future hikers, I couldn't scratch the itch, so I moved that date up to the Ides of March 2017. The only reason I am not embarking this Spring is due to too little planning/preparation time and funds. I look forward to following several of you on your journeys and trials this year.
Just putting some feelers out for anyone in Tennessee area that would like to link up for some weekend/extended weekend hikes over the course of the year for training/shakedown purposes.
Mentally, Yes! Physically, Somewhat...Gear, No way!
